body.p:
The XProc tab contains the following options:
XProc URL Specify the source XProc file to be used by the transformation. This URL is resolved through the catalog resolver. If the catalog does not have a mapping for the URL, the file is used directly from its remote location.
Processor Allows you to select the XProc engine to be used for the transformation. You can choose from Calabash for XProc 1.X, Calabash for XProc 3.X, or a custom engine that is configured in the XProc Preferences page.
Extensions Opens a dialog box where you can specify additional extension libraries to be added to the class path used in the XProc transformation.
